doctor.name: Dr. Rajkumar Roy
doctor.info: Dr. Rajkumar Roy is a Neurosurgeon in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Neurosurgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Neurosurgery at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Rajkumar Roy at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 4pm to 8pm (Everyday).
